bio: I have multiple years of experience in both working from my home office and in being a freelancer. You can rest assured that I will dedicate all of the time and energy needed into any project I work on and will have it completed in the most efficient and timely manner possible. I have been a proofreader and researcher since 2012 and virtual assistant since 2015. In that time, I've completed many projects for many clients and am happy to provide testimonials/feedback from other platforms. Research is what I love to do the most. Some people may find it boring or tedious, but I am perfectly happy to sit at my computer looking at spreadsheets all day.

I'm open to both fixed project rates as well as hourly rates. My preferred projects are research based. My minimum hourly rate is $25 per hour and rates depend on the complexity of the project. I'm more than happy to give you a quote and timeframe if you let me know what your needs are.

abstrac: Euexia Architecture is a multidisciplinary firm founded by ALI ABIDI, Architect who put all his accumulated knowledge of different experiences in the development of architectural concepts
bio:
ALI ABIDI, graduated from University of Architecture & Urban Planning of Tunis. He had the chance to work in University of Tolima, Colombia as an intern. With artistic sensibility, great concern to National Heritage, Ali realized his graduation project, which was published in Tunisian architecture magazine and awarded with honorable mention in Istanbul by MMSP.

In 2017, he won Travel Fellowship Competition organized by the University of Berkeley in California, after a hard work on the theme "Architecture Reveals community", which lead him to look forward volunteering in Ghana and participate in InsideOut Workshop.

Ali is collaborating with different architecture firms in Tunisia, participate on international competitions, and decide on 2019 to lunch his own agency “EUEXIA ARCHITECTURE”, which is specialized in residential projects and is offering freelance architectural services all over the world.

abstrac: Creative power and immaculate professionalism combined
bio:
I am a freelance writer, researcher, and editor. My clients have included the United Nations, the Global Foundation of Democracy and Development, Professor Kyung-Hee Kim of the College of William and Mary, Dr. David Moore,  Beaton Global, Cornell Associates, Apple Learning, the Grace Foundation, Kim, Kyung-Hee, professor at The College of William and Mary, Merrill Corporation, The Miller Institute, University of Zurich (Institute of Mass Communication and Media Research), XAMonline, and others. 

A published author, I wrote the marriage, family, and conflict resolution sections of the book Cultivating Heart and Character: Educating for Life’s Most Essential Goals. The book was published by Character Development Group, North Carolina, (2000). I contributed a chapter on “The Causes and Resolution of Conflict” to the anthology The Future of Peace, published by Carolina Academic Press in 2003. I was also the author and co-author of the teachers’ manuals and students’ texts in a children’s and young adults’ fiction series entitled Alive to the World. The 24-book series was published by Alliance for the Family, Washington, D.C., throughout the years 2005-2012. In 2012-2013, I wrote articles for the website 7Score10 in commemoration of the Sesquicentennial (150 years) of the Civil War. My articles have been “retweeted” consistently the Smithsonian’s 150 Year Civil War project and also by the Civil War Monitor. 

I have a B.A. in English from the University of Iowa and was accepted into the prestigious Writers Workshop.

I am a self-disciplined, motivated professional. I am a self-starter and work well and dynamically when given clear instructions and the freedom to carry them out. I enjoy meeting and working with clients through Guru and place customer satisfaction as a top priority.

abstrac: Full stack .NET Developer more then 20 years in Development
bio:
My Name is Ravi and I am Full Stake .Net developer having 15+ Years of development experience working for many clients in US , Australia , UK ,Angola and Indonesia.

I have worked on more than 200+ project for various companies & teams so far and over the years, I have gained a lot of knowledge and experience in other open source tools and technologies like Nodejs and Angular


I have strong knowledge and experience in following areas:

Web Programming-    .Net technology, C#/VB.Net/Asp.Net/PHP , Web Services , Web API, REST API
Reporting Services-   Crystal Report/ SSRS Report
Java Script / J-Query, HTML/XHTML, CSS, JavaScript
Database Design-  SQL Server/MySQL
Mobile Development (iOS Objective -C and Android java) , React Native
Web Design-    HTML5/CSS3/Responsive Mobile design
Open Source-   Node.js , Angularjs, Express.js  ,Git  


I am pretty sure I will be huge benefit to the team and the company.

Turnaround time: 1 Business Day

Availability: 24x7

Payment terms: NO UPFRONT PAYMENTS
On Mutual Agreements, only through Guru Safepay only on milestone delivery or hourly payments as mutually agreed.

Communication channels:
Email, Skype, Hangouts, Whatsapp
